## Get Involved

All participants are welcome to join the Innovation Information Initiative. We have hosted regular convenings since 2019 to shape this collaborative and share our work.

## Contributing

We welcome contributions in several areas:

- **Essays and Notes**: Share your research and insights related to innovation data
- **Datasets**: Contribute datasets or scripts to our public repository
- **Technical Working Group**: Join our regular convenings and technical discussions
- **Feedback**: Help us improve the initiative by sharing your ideas

## Support

The Innovation Information Initiative is supported by the **Alfred P. Sloan Foundation**, with facilitation by **NBER** and the **Knowledge Futures Group**.
